meanings.definition: Any of a class of oxygenated derivatives of twenty-carbon polyunsaturated fatty acids, including the prostaglandins, thromboxanes, and leukotrienes, which are involved in cellular signaling.
meanings.sent1: Eicosanoids play a crucial role in cellular communication within the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of eicosanoids on various signaling pathways.
meanings.sent3: The eicosanoids in the body were having a party, sending messages to each other.
meanings.sent4: In the intricate network of cellular communication, eicosanoids act as messengers.
meanings.sent5: Imagine eicosanoids as tiny couriers delivering important messages between cells.
